articles.author: The Argentine star's wife wanted to know the physical condition of the Argentina captain after he suffered a nasty injury in the Copa América final.
articles.title: VIDEO | Antonela Roccuzzo's concern over Messi's injured ankle 🥺 - beIN SPORTS
articles.description: The Argentine star's wife wanted to know the physical condition of the Argentina captain after he suffered a nasty injury in the Copa América final.
articles.content:
From there, he watched as La Albiceleste touched glory once again thanks to Lautaro Martínez's goal in overtime.
Concern for the Argentine star spread worldwide after images showed his swollen ankle… [+607 chars]
